item.title: Ferina add a quote by Trenton Lee Stewart
item.description: "Rules and school are tools for fools! I don't give two mules for rules." -- Trenton Lee Stewart

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Trenton Lee Stewart
item.description: "Is this what family is like: the feeling that everyone’s connected, that with one piece missing, the whole thing’s broken?" -- Trenton Lee Stewart

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Jhumpa Lahiri
item.description: "That's the thing about books. They let you travel without moving your feet." -- Jhumpa Lahiri

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Jhumpa Lahiri
item.description: "Try to remember it always," he said once Gogol had reached him, leading him slowly back across the breakwater, to where his mother and Sonia stood waiting. "Remember that you and I made this journey together to a place where there was nowhere left to go." -- Jhumpa Lahiri

item.title: Ferina add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Lucy Maud Montgomery
item.description: "Perhaps, after all, romance did not come into one’s life with pomp and blare, like a gay knight riding down; perhaps it crept to one’s side like an old friend through quiet ways; perhaps it revealed itself in seeming prose, until some sudden shaft of illumination flung athwart its pages betrayed the rhythm and the music, perhaps . . . perhaps . . . love unfolded naturally out of a beautiful friendship, as a golden-hearted rose slipping from its green sheath." -- Lucy Maud Montgomery

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Melissa Marr
item.description: "Sometimes love means letting go when you want to hold on tighter." -- Melissa Marr

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "I like myself better when I'm with you." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Sometimes when you sacrifice something precious, you're not really losing it. You're just passing it on to someone else." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Ferina add a quote by A.A. Milne
Ferina add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Ferina add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "The best way to look at the soul is through closed eyes." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Laughter is sunshine, it chases winter from the human face." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description:
"A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity. It dares all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
<i>-The Last Seance (from The Hound of Death and Other Stories, also Double Sin and Other Stories)</i>" -- Agatha Christie
